DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Phacoemulsification superior SICS regard : - Immediate unaided high low contrast visual performance - Its impact quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Following Phacoemulsification Versus Small Incision Cataract Surgery ( SICS )
DOC.detailed_description: Phacoemulsification procedure - Infiniti Vision System Software 2.03 high , OZil handpiece ( HP ) - Anaesthesia : topical - Incision : temporal clear corneal 2.2 mm single plane - CCC hydrodissection , sculpt division use step step chop situ lateral separation , I/A . - Single-piece AcrySof IOL ( SN60WF ) bag SICS procedure - Anaesthesia : peribulbar - Incision : superior scleral tunnel 6.5 7 mm - CCC hydrodissection - Nuclear expression : blumenthal technique use anterior chamber maintainer , manual cortical clean-up - Single-piece PMMA ( MZ60BD ) bag
DOC.criteria: Prospective subject diagnose senile cataract . Subject must require extraction cataract one eye follow implantation AcrySof ( SN60WF ) PMMA ( MZ60BD ) posterior chamber intraocular lens . Pupil dilation equal great 7 mm mydriasis . Patients undergo cataract surgery first eye . Visual prognosis equal great 6/12 . Patients history ocular pathology , glaucoma , uveitis , high myopia , PEX , corneal pathology . Patients traumatic , subluxate posterior polar cataract . Patients previously ocular surgery past 6 month prior screen visit . Patients diabetic retinopathy . Patients suitable followup visit . Patients Fuchs ' Dystrophy , Macular Degeneration , Ocular Surface Disease interfere normal recovery . Any patient significant intraoperative complication remove overall analysis result . All patient data still record , even `` exclude '' patient group .
